languages.text: "Совет, не более: берегись мерцающей синевы. А то закончишь как Горгориус Фальт..."
"Just a piece of advice: beware the shimmering blue. Or else you'll end up like Gorgorius Falt..."
languages.original_text: "Совет, не более: берегись мерцающей синевы. А то закончишь как Горгориус Фальт..."

traits.locale_text: "Just a piece of advice: beware the shimmering blue. Or you'll end up like Gorgorius Falt..."
"Just a piece of advice: beware the shimmering blue. Or you'll end up like Gorgorius Falt..."
"Just a piece of advice: beware the shimmering blue. Or else you'll end up like Gorgorius Falt..."
"Just a piece of advice: beware the shimmering blue. Or else you'll end up like Gorgorius Falt..."
"Just a piece of advice: beware the shimmering blue. Or else you'll end up like Gorgorius Falt..."
"Just a piece of advice: beware the shimmering blue. Or else you'll end up like Gorgorius Falt..."

languages.text: 「ひとつ忠告しておきます。輝く青には気をつけてください。さもないと、ゴルゴリウス・ファルトみたいになりますよ…」
languages.original_text: "Just a piece of advice: beware the shimmering blue. Or else you'll end up like Gorgorius Falt..."

traits.locale_text: 「ひとつ忠告しておきます。輝く青には気をつけてください。さもないと、ゴルゴリウス・ファルトみたいになりますよ…」

languages.text: "Ufak bir tavsiye: Parıldayan mavilikten uzak durun. Yoksa sonunuz Gorgorius Falt gibi olur."
languages.original_text: "Just a piece of advice: beware the shimmering blue. Or else you'll end up like Gorgorius Falt..."

traits.locale_text: "Ufak bir tavsiye: parıldayan mavilikten uzak durun. Yoksa sonunuz Gorgorius Falt gibi olur."

languages.text: «Solo puedo darle un consejo: guárdese del azul reluciente. Si no, acabará como Gorgorius Falt...».
languages.original_text: "Just a piece of advice: beware the shimmering blue. Or else you'll end up like Gorgorius Falt..."

traits.locale_text: «Solo puedo darle un consejo: guárdese del azul reluciente. Si no, acabará como Gorgorius Falt...».

languages.text: “给您一点小建议：要当心闪烁的蓝光，否则您也会变得像戈里乌斯·法尔特一样……”
languages.original_text: "Just a piece of advice: beware the shimmering blue. Or else you'll end up like Gorgorius Falt..."

traits.locale_text: “给您一点小建议：要当心闪烁的蓝光，否则您也会变得像戈里乌斯·法尔特一样……”

languages.text: « Un conseil : méfiez-vous de la lueur bleue. Autrement, vous finirez comme Gorgorius Falt... »
languages.original_text: "Just a piece of advice: beware the shimmering blue. Or else you'll end up like Gorgorius Falt..."

traits.locale_text: « Un conseil : méfiez-vous de la lueur bleue. Autrement, vous finirez comme Gorgorius Falt... »

languages.text: "Hört auf meinen Rat: Hütet Euch vor dem schimmernden Blau. Andernfalls endet Ihr wie Gorgorius Falt ..."
languages.original_text: "Just a piece of advice: beware the shimmering blue. Or else you'll end up like Gorgorius Falt..."

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf meinen Rat: Hütet Euch vor dem schimmernden Blau. Andernfalls endet Ihr wie Gorgorius Falt ..."
